website_summaries.verdict: This hair growth vitamin is not only easy to chew, but also suitable for vegetarians.
pros: Offers easy-chew, gummy formula for customers who have difficulty swallowing pills
Cruelty-free vegetarian formula, also free of gluten and gelatin
cons: Some customers reported an acne breakout after using

customer_reviews.title: YES, IT WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: (To be blunt, I'm black.) And my fellow sistas are probably searching through these comments looking for someone to say whether or not this product works for US. Ladies, I do believe this works! I've been taking it for 3 months now and my hair dresser tells me every appointment that my hair is growing :) Just purchased the 3 month supply. I should have some inches by the winter time haha!
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Led to a Doctor's Visit
customer_reviews.text: There is no warning on this product to alert you to the possible side-effects. It darkened my daughter's urine and we assumed she had a UTI. This led to a doctor's visit and eventual lab work. These came back indicating that her thyroid levels were low. The provider explained that this is a side effect of biotin. We had no idea. Be very careful with this product. It seems harmless, but it can really cause some issues.
customer_reviews.author: mosaic mama

customer_reviews.title: Good for hair, BAD for skin
customer_reviews.text: So I read all the reviews...the ones with pictures of how fast everyone’s hair was growing and how thick. I also read the ones with the acne. I decided to take the chance—I’ve never had acne and feel I’m pretty “prone” (which a lot of others said too). Unfortunately I was wrong...my skin got HORRIBLE. I usually get a pimple here and there and it’s tiny. I had huge, painful acne and a ton of tiny red pimple everywhere. I do think my hair was growing a little faster but the good did not outweigh the bad for me.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: ⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: It grows your hair, and tastes good, YES IT WORKS but for less money you can buyand it works just as well! sugarbearhair is great but 30$ a month was a lot to pay. They say you can get acne from taking too much biotin, and i did get some acne from taking sugarbearhair but not so much with radiant beauty. Better do something soon sugarbear, paying the kardashians will only help you for so long!!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Side Effects
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try this product. I had always here such great reviews about them. They had a great taste, and I did see a difference in the strength of my hair. However, it made my skin breakout like crazy. The bad skin side effect just was not worth the small differences in my hair. I would recommend finding a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kish

customer_reviews.title: Impressive growth
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for 3 months and saw great results!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: but i had a bad reaction to the biotin levels which gave me cystic ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a month, and my hair and nails did grow, but i had a bad reaction to the biotin levels which gave me cystic acne. People said it was a 50/50 chance and i hoped to be the half not to get the acne. Tastes good but wouldnt order again.. id rather have nice skin and short hair than long hair to hide my bad skin.
customer_reviews.author: RHFFR

customer_reviews.title: It made me break out so bad. I stopped taking them and my acne went ...
customer_reviews.text: It made me break out so bad. I stopped taking them and my acne went away and once i tried to take them again i started breaking out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Railey

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, but damaged
customer_reviews.text: The gummies are amazing and do wonders for my hair and nails. However, I got my shipment today and it looks like it’s been run over and all the gummies look like one big blob. Trying to contact customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Broke out even when cutting the dosage. SO BAD
customer_reviews.text: I tried to stick with them thinking the breakouts would only last so long but they didn't. I even at one point took 1 a day and my skin still broke out. Not worth it for the lack of results.... my nails are usually a good indicator of a good vitamin but the did not improve either and my skin is usually perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: My hair was falling out in clumps and getting super thin in the front
customer_reviews.text: My hair was falling out in clumps and getting super thin in the front. On the recommendation of my hair stylist, I ordered SugarBearHair. I have tons of new hair growth. So pleased and, they taste amazing. I have trouble limiting myself to the recommended dose!
customer_reviews.author: Cyferguson

customer_reviews.title: Buy directly from sugarbearhair website!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to start this by saying I do LOVE these vitamins!! I thought they were overhyped, but decided to give them a shot. I’ve taken them for 2 months so far and my hair and nails are better than they have EVER been. However I recommend buying directly from the sugarbearhair website instead of amazon. In the picture the left bear is what I got from amazon- the right is directly from the company. I guess when ordered from amazon it’s just not as fresh. With that said-these vitamins are SO worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: CAUSES ACNE
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. My skin looks the worst it’s ever looked in my life. Enormous bumps, so many, and they won’t go away. I never break out. I am so disappointed. It didn’t start until 2.5 weeks into taking them, so I used more than half the bottle before I knew I needed to stop. DO NOT BUY THESE. Not to mention, my hair doesn’t look any better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try saffron secret hair products that's the only thing at this point that has been helping my hair and it smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Made my skin breakout and couldn't tell a difference in my hair. Try saffron secret hair products that's the only thing at this point that has been helping my hair and it smells amazing
customer_reviews.author: casey sparks

customer_reviews.title: Buy this vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I am 66 years old and my hair looks amazing! Before I started on a regimen using Sugar Bear Hair my hair was extremely thin and fine. Now it is gorgeous! I get compliments constantly. This is the stuff if you want a healthy head of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused massive GI issues
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for these gummies! They taste amazing, my hair was doing well and I somehow avoided the acne that other people had complained about. But I ended up with terrible stomach pains, was sick in bed for three days and then would wake up at 3 am with the worst stomach cramps for almost a week. These gummies were the only change in my diet and since I stopped taking them the stomach pains have slowly gone away.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Decent results and great taste!
customer_reviews.text: These taste great. The people who said they broke out when they took it were clearly not drinking enough water. When you take biotin you need to drink lots of water. This product helped my skin clear up and I noticed my nails growing faster. I originally bought these vitamins to help stop my hair from falling out since I lose a lot of hair. This helped a little bit with my hair falling out but not too much as of yet. I’ve only been taking these for a little over a month so I will be able to give a better review by the end of my second bottle and I will update!
customer_reviews.author: AKP

customer_reviews.title: Give it a Chance- week 3 is when the magic begins
customer_reviews.text: True to the reviews, at week 3 I noticed a big difference. Hair started growing like a weed! I ended up ordering the 3 bottles + brush deal directly from Sugar Bear Hair. It tastes like hawaiian punch. I love this!!! Less hair falling out, hair feels healthier, it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Fake vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! I purchased this vitamin on Amazon. I took all but one vitamin and then I purchased a second bottle that came direct from the manufacturer. The Amazon vitamin is on the left and it’s GREEN! The real vitamin from the manufacturer is on the right and it’s BLUE. The face on the green one has holes on the face of the bear. The one on the right from the manufacturer has two eyes and a nose. I had heard before that you can get fake products on Amazon and now I’m a believer that it’s true! It makes me sick to think that I chewed 29 of those awful vitamins!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I am 57 and my hair was falling out and receding at an alarming rate! I am starting my 4th bottle, and my hair is growing back! Even my hair dresser noticed! Even my over plucked eyebrows are growing back, and my nails are longer and stronger! Very pleased with this product. They also taste great! The only semi negative is the blue color of the gummies make your tongue look like you ate a smurf😂
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Quinn

customer_reviews.title: SugarBearHair: Great Hair, Terrible Breakouts.
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous reviews stating that SugarBearHair caused lots of breakouts, I decided to go against my better judgment to try them out, only to be left disappointed. After taking SugarBearHair for about two weeks, my skin started breaking out more, and the breakouts that I already had on my face became inflamed. On the bright side, my hair became smoother and shinier, compared to how my hair was coarse and dull before. Needless to say, I won't be ordering or taking these again. They were a waste of money, considering how many breakouts they caused.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Holy guacamole, works works works. And delicious! Dying to buy more! My hair and nails grew like crazy. I had to cut my nails really often (since I work around food, I need to keep them trim). I want to get more. I'm aiming to grow my hair down to my navel and for sure this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have seen a ton of new hair growth along with a major improvement in my nails. I couldn't be happier. I've seen a lot of reviews from people with acne prone skin and problems with break outs on this product. I also have acne prone skin and have actually seen my skin clear up quite a bit since I started using this product. It might just be a coincidence but I will definitely be reordering!
customer_reviews.author: D. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product after reading all the amazing reviews and viewing the progress photos. However, I am disappointed in the results. My hair is still shedding, not any longer and does not seem to have improved at all since starting the vitamins. I drink a lot of water so I did not experience the acne that everyone was talking about. Since these vitamins are so expensive, I was expecting results! You would be better off buying some less expensive hair vitamins or biotin from the grocery store. The packaging is beautiful and the taste is great. Yet, I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: RocketMan

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients are not accurately displayed online
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to order this item and when it arrived I was saddened to see that the ingredients were not accurately listed on amazon. This product has 'coconut' in it and I am severely allergic to 'coconut'. I am also disappointed to find out this product isn't eligible for returns and I've wasted my money on a product that will kill me upon usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The FDA does not monitor the potency of supplements.
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser recommended these so I thought I would try despite how expensive they were. I have used a one a day gummies and liked the flavor and consistency of those better. These are an odd robins egg blue color and a firmer consistency. That didn’t t bother me tremendously but they also made no difference to my hair. In addition, after reading a book about problems with pharmaceuticals, I went to a website where they perform independent analysis of supplements. They reported that this product had 160% of the listed amounts. More vitamins can be as problematic as too few so I do not plan on continuing to take them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarouche

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and fast results!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a little over a month now and have already noticed a huge difference in my hair! My hair used to be thin, brittle, and would fall out every time I brushed my hair. Ever since I've started using these vitamins, my hair has become stronger, healthier, and hardly any hair falls out when i brush it. You have to take these vitamins religiously though. Taking them every few days and missing out on your daily dose will not help you
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: These were NOT real SugarBearHair vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: Dear Amazon, I have no idea who your supplier was for these ‘vitamins’, but it definitely was NOT SugarBearHair- these were obviously counterfeit! The packaging looked real, but the color, taste, texture, consistency, flavor was NOTHING like the product as purchased from the source. A bad fake- gritty, hard, chewy, color was off. Blech! I took one dose and I’m a little scared to know what I actually ate. Going back to the direct source for the real deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H.

customer_reviews.title: Steady overall hair growth
customer_reviews.text: This hair gummy supplement works well for me. I’ve notices over 2 inches within two months of using this for one month. Plus my nails have grown out rapidly. It is not a slow but steady process and each person hair grows at a different rate. I’ve noticed my skin looks brighter and clearer as well. I have had NO side effects. Yes do drink lots of water as we should everyday. I actually prefer this over hairfinity pills because I had breakouts when I used it and even though it works quicker than sugarbear hair gummies, I will use the latter instead cause I didn’t have any reactions. But I’d recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: parc

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering from amazon for a while now but this is the first time i am going to write a review. Sugar bear hair is amazing! Few years ago i had a hair treatment and it really ruined my hair and left a patch on my hair line. I am only on my 1st bottle and not even a month of using it i've seen results already!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I hate that I like these because I know who they're endorsed by... However, they actually do seem to work. Other attempts at sticking to a hair vitamin routine have gone south when I would either forget, or they would give me an upset stomach. These actually taste great so I remember to take them, and I've never had any gastrointestinal issues. I feel a bit like a 12 year old girl popping something that looks like a Care-Bear emoji, but they actually seem to have improved the texture and quality of my hair over the past few months so I got over it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Food coloring but delish
customer_reviews.text: SO GOOD!! Be warned they taste like candy but aren’t. Lol. Two a day is recommended. I’ve been chewing these up for a couple months and honestly not sure I note anything with my hair, but my nails are growing crazy fast. I hate long nails so I clip them off all the time, so I am hoping it has good effect on my hair with continued use. I absolutely wish they did not have food coloring in them since they are a “vitamin”. They don’t have to be blue to taste good and work.
customer_reviews.author: Ckdub

customer_reviews.title: Rash behind ears, neck and around eye brows & mouth.
customer_reviews.text: I got a rash behind each ear & down the sides of my neck like small pimples. And small pimples around my eye brows and around my mouth. I’ve never experienced anything like it. I quit taking it after a few days, so didn’t take them long. Thankfully Amazon refunded my money. Really disappointed in these. Bummed because I’ve been trying to find a vitamin for hair growth to replace the monat vitamin I used to take. I don’t think biotin is the issue with this vitamin, because I’ve taken it before & didnt experience this.
customer_reviews.author: csk

customer_reviews.title: I am on my second month, it is working ...
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second month, it is working, but things dont happen overnight they are yummy will order 3 months next time🐻🐻katie
customer_reviews.author: katie brierley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I broke out a few days after I started using them, but I had read the reviews before purchasing and figured it would happen. I don’t drink much water, so I have made strides to drink more. Otherwise, I have been taking these for several months now and the difference is noticeable. My hair has grown several inches and my nails are super long and stronger than ever. My hair is shinier, soft and the hairfall has stopped. I’m surprised at the difference and will continue to incorporate this in my routine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Acne from this Product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately didn’t get to see the results for my hair. Within a week, my face broke out like it never has. I rarely have acne (maybe one or two pimples on my chin) and this is what my face looks like after using SugarBearHair for 7 days. My whole face is covered. Would not recommend using this. Stick with regular biotin pills to avoid this. The concept of the product is great, and I’d continue using them if I saw results. But the breakout lost it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Cystic Acne
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gummies because I am getting married this summer and wanted to grow my hair long and have beautiful shiny locks...well, it totally works for your hair! My hair looks gorgeous, but 2 months away and I now have CYSTIC ACNE. I thought it was the extra wedding stress. Never in my life have I had skin problems...I went online to write a great review of the gummies and then read some of the other reviews on Amazon. It makes complete sense now, I will be discontinuing taking these gummies. The skin problems are not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: No huge difference, caused a lot of acne
customer_reviews.text: The gummies taste very good took them for about 4 months (4 bottles) and only noticed a little difference in hair growth, didn't grow as much as I thought it would but that could be because my hair is very slow growing.... bad thing is they made me break out so bad! I have never had this many pimples in my life! Store bought biotin has never caused so many breakouts and I take more mcg a day with those in my opinion these gummies work the same as the biotin I buy at Wal-Mart except I don't break out as much with the Wal-Mart ones.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Problem —> Solution!
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because it’s an amazing product and my hair grew SO much! (More than any other hair vitamin I’ve taken) BUT.. Also four stars, because if you have acne prone skin like I do, you will probably break out. It took a couple days for my skin to clear up, but there’s an easy solution. Just take one gummy a day, not two. Still a great amount of biotin to help your hair grow, and you won’t have the acne side effects! Really really loved these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Work!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like taking gummies. I have a hard time swallowing pills, especially large vitamins. They taste really good. But, the amazing thing is they work!!! My nails and my hair were breaking off due to some medicine I was taking. I tried several things with no results. I was so discouraged. My nails would break down to the quick and my hair had little pieces sticking up all over. Within two weeks I began to notice a difference and at the one month mark even better. I rarely leave a review but I had to leave this one so It might help someone in their decision to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: D J Malone

customer_reviews.title: Does not work !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on reviews and people say that celebrities are using those vitamins and say it works . Celebrities probably get paid to say that because I have tried for one month and besides irritated scalp I got nothing out of it , I did not notice any results , they taste ok , very sweet but I won’t buy it again , price is high for something that does not do anything positive for your body.
customer_reviews.author: Madlen Dye

customer_reviews.title: They were ok. Was able to get the same ...
customer_reviews.text: They were ok. Was able to get the same vitamins in Walmart for half the price with the same ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Made nails grow fast, hair not so much
customer_reviews.text: Pros: holy crap, my nails grew SO fast!! They were super strong (genetically I have brittle nails) and I was very impressed. My skin cleared up strangely enough as well. Also when I didn't renew my supply ( I had a tonsillectomy and wasn't allowed to take any supplements/vitamins beforehand), within a week I noticed a huge difference--my nails chipped much easier and they ended up all breaking off, and my acne came back real nasty like. Cons: Yeah hair was shiny and felt great, but didn't really grow any faster. Anywhere from 1/2 inch to 3/4 inch in a month. About your average monthly growth, so I liked it fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbs

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all!
customer_reviews.text: I ve been using 2 gummy bears a days and it breaks me out like crazy... wow I’m in shock right now what did I get myself into.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Pham

customer_reviews.title: Saving me after a bad hair cut, yay!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen these bad boys all over Instagram and YouTube and have always been curious about them. After a really bad haircut (I mean like random choppy layers, the kind that make you cry when you finally get home and take a closer look) I decided I needed to boost my hair growth. These taste awesome, kind of like berry flavored lemonade. They also have a lot of the other vitamins I take daily, so this eliminated about 3 different pills from my daily routine! I’m already on my second month supply and I can tell my hair is growing fast since my hair is dyed and the roots are coming in quicker than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oily skin and upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible. The first few day I took it it upset my stomach. I thought of changing doses from one gummy in the morning and one at night, still made me loose appetite and upset stomach. My face became super oily. I then just took one gummy a day and still felt horrible. Honestly not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Joffre Balseca

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without them
customer_reviews.text: At first I was like it’s an internet scam that’s too expensive and not worth the money fast forward to today I’ve been taking these for a month and I can’t rave about them enough. My skin is clear, my hair is growing quickly and just feels so much healthier. My nails are getting much stronger and I honestly feel like these vitamins are all around great I will keep purchasing as long as they keep making them.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: This product came with no label on the bottle and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product came with no label on the bottle and did not say it was actually sugarbear vitamins. Had no directions and you have no clue what you are actually taking. Definitely, returning and would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Give this a try if you’re losing your hair!!
customer_reviews.text: My hair was falling out, thinning out, I had no idea why. My hairdresser and I were stumped: nothing in my diet had changed, no product changes. She recommended I find a hair vitamin and I chose these. It wasn’t overnight, took a few months but my hair is now growing, it’s fuller and I’m not losing nearly as much! I will always take these vitamins. I put my hair in a bun this morning!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It helps but you may break out
customer_reviews.text: After some permanent hair treatments my hair follicles were so weak that I was shedding way too much hair each time I washed and brushed it. I was trying not to freak out and I got oils, vitamins and these gummy’s. Out of all three I’ve been consistent with the gummy’s and I have noticed a difference! I have less hair shedding, which makes me super happy BUT my face started breaking out!! I’m about half way done with the bottle and I’m taking a break for now until I get my face together. I am always getting compliments on my skin and I am sad that my face has these bumps (mainly on cheeks).
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: After reading other reviews I did contact sugar bear hair ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews I did contact sugar bear hair to verify that they do sell their product through Amazon, and was given a link to this product by the company. I do see hair growth, but my hair is not really any thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Mare~

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous to purchase this product after reading other reviews about the acne. I am prone to acne usually so I contemplated buying this for a while, but was desperate for hair growth so I ended up just doing for it. I am on day 20 of these, and no acne whatsoever. If anything, my face is more clear than it ever has been before. It sounds like from other reviewers, that if they aren't prone to acne, this makes them get it and vice versa. I already see a difference in my hair growth and my roots are looking nice and shiny! I will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Longer hair
customer_reviews.text: I love there flavor, easy to swallow. I do notice my hair is longer, but I have been taking them for 2 months. After I finish the 1st bottle I ordered the 3 month supply. My main concern is getting back the fullness in my hair. I have seen the positive reviews. And cant wait to see more positive results. As acne goes, I haven't had any. There are a little pricey but these pills have more vitamins then just biotin alone.
customer_reviews.author: JCL

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I got this after listening to the ad on a podcast and decided to give a try as I want to grow my hair and I have been struggling with it for so long. I used for two months, yes the gummies taste great, but it did not worked for me, my hair didn’t grown more than my regular month growth. I used for two months and decided to stop. I was taking it everyday and following all the instructions. I did not felt any difference to my hair or my nails. My nails also break a lot and it doesn’t grown. This changed nothing
customer_reviews.author: Alekssa Y. Dantas Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great results bad side effects
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking SugarBear Hair vitamins for 2 months now. I had great results, more volume and length to my hair and my nails have never been healthier. However my face has been extremely oily which I never had an issue with before and I started breaking out a lot near my jawline. Mind you I very rarely have breakouts. Also, my hair has been extremely oily which I never had this issue before I took the vitamins. I drink plenty of water as you should with taking this much Biotin. Sadly I have cancelled my subscription because the side effects are not worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kortney

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Loving these. I have not noticed longer hair yet. I did get my hair trimmed after the first bottle and I am not finished end bottle yet. I have noticed that my hair lays better and seems stronger. May update my review in the future. I wish this Amazon seller offered a three month supplly like the website does.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Causes Acne
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had an acne breakout In a while and I had read the reviews thinking that it wouldn’t the sugar bear hair vitamins wouldn’t cause that. But sure enough within three days of use I had a break out. I didn’t notice much change while using them. I bought them for my nails because my hair is already growing fast and pretty thick, but my nails are thin and break very easily. I used this product for a little over a week, maybe I didn’t wait long enough but all I know is when I stopped using this product I hadn’t gotten anymore acne since. But it does have a great taste!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hill

customer_reviews.title: Taking or using anything with biotin, including shampoo will strengthen your hair
customer_reviews.text: I did feel like my hair did not fall out as much while taking these. A little more pricey than purchasing at the drugstore (a different brand). Great flavor. However, as long as I take Hair, skin and nail gummy’s with biotin, my hair doesn’t fall out as much. You can get a much better value at the drugstore than purchasing this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Williams

customer_reviews.title: I really thought I would see results because of how popular they are and all the good reviews I hear but they did not do anything ...
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are a scam. I really thought I would see results because of how popular they are and all the good reviews I hear but they did not do anything for my hair at all. I have been taking care of my hair I have only been using heat products about once or twice a week and take vitamins twice a day as directed. No results at all. My hair is the same length as it was two months ago. I thought I would give then second month a chance since I didn't see results the first month but nothing. I will be ordering It Works Vitamins now.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Tastes pretty good too
customer_reviews.text: Seriously made my hair grow faster. I was shocked. I really didn't put much stock in it, but I thought I'd try it. Wow! Tastes pretty good too, although my hubby didn't like the smell. I didn't mind it. I DID mind the price! However, I noticed it's just BIOTIN. So I bought some high-potency biotin capsules at Whole Foods and I'm trying them for this month. I'm anxious to see if the result is the same because the cost is half. If it wasn't for the price, I'd have awarded five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, But Order Directly from SugarBear
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other people's reviews before purchasing. The pink vitamins are actually more of a brownish color. Both of the vitamin bottles were within the expiration date, but the quality of the vitamins (both in taste and texture) was lacking. Having ordered directly from SugarBear before, I can tell you that the blue ones taste AMAZING (like gummy bears), but I didn't notice much of a difference on my hair. Maybe it's a subtle change. If you want something that tastes good, buy these directly from SugarBear. Overall though, I think they're overpriced for what you get. Go with a cheaper vitamin/supplement if you're just wanting your hair to grow.
customer_reviews.author: RandomUsedBooks

customer_reviews.title: Break outs
customer_reviews.text: I was so hopeful for this product ... The gummy vitamins do taste good - and for any 90’s babies, they almost take like Scooby-Doo fruit snacks. I have been taking them for about 3 months and haven’t noticed any positive differences. I have such a hard time growing my hair out and it hasn’t done anything for it, but maybe just a little thicker. It did though cause me an awful breakout on my face, and when that went away it moved to my chest. I have NEVER broken out on my chest until now and it’s awful. Really wished these would of worked like they were supposed to
customer_reviews.author: jessjlt7

customer_reviews.title: Somethings wrong
customer_reviews.text: The texture is not gummy ish. It felt reallt dry and when i bit into it its kinda starchy and broke down to a lot of pieces. I owned the actual product that i bought from their website b4 and that 1 is like gummy bear. Idk if its just the way it was shipped maybe it was sitting on the vehicle for a long time plus the heat or its just the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: chris roxas

customer_reviews.title: Acne galore
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive and will give you acne. I got more zits in 5 days on this vitamin than I had in the entirety of 2019. It as excess iodine that can aggravate sebum production in the skin, that could cause breakouts in people with sensitive skin but also people who have never had acne. I have taken other hair and nails vitamins and they haven't done this. I am so disappointed because it was an expensive mistake on my end. If you really want nice hair and nails, try a prenatal vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: WOWZA
customer_reviews.text: After having three babies my hair has thinned out tremendously! I read a lot of reviews about developing acne but I already had acne so whatever, right? This is crazy but it actually made my hair SUPER shiny AND my face is more clear? Like, how? I don't know but I approve.
customer_reviews.author: MamaSar

customer_reviews.title: 10 year hair problems just got solved!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I have all sorts of hair problems from thinning, patchy hair, alopecia, one side of my hair stopped growing. This has been the most humiliating 10 year problem but in the last 4 years stopping everything has made my hair healthy yet I still have trouble with thinning :( I started taking these 2.5 weeks ago and got my hair dyed 3 weeks ago. My roots have already grown a millimeter and my hair is thicker. Gummies taste amazing! Seriously if you’ve had any of the problems I’ve had stop everything! Dont box dye it’s so bad for your hair! Apply heat with a heat protector!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stellar results
customer_reviews.text: So, I had been taking a different hair vitamin around the same price point for about a year; I've seen more of a dramatic change in the past month using Sugarbear than over the course of the past year taking a different vitamin designed to do the same thing. I was a tiny bit skeptical of this product having so many stellar reviews, but now I know that this is a stellar product that delivers! UPDATE: THIS IS NOW MY SECOND TIME PURCHASING! STILL ENJOYING STELLAR RESULTS
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Clark

customer_reviews.title: Why are they green?
customer_reviews.text: I have order these before on Amazon and looked like the original ones I would buy at Ulta, but lately they been a green color and not the light blue. I don’t know why, but I don’t feel comfortable purchasing this product on here anymore because of that.
customer_reviews.author: cbenz

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: it's been about two weeks, I have to stop taking them because I'm breaking out with cystic acne. I've never had problems with my skin. TAKE A DIFFERENT SUPPLEMENT!!!! I will update in a month after taking, but as of today: just received. Condition and flavor are fantastic! So glad that they aren't wonky, based on other reviewers. I am myself pretty reliant on other reviews for my purchases, so I will certainly be back with pictures once a month has gone by.
customer_reviews.author: Sly Fox Wills

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING AT IT’S MAXIMUM
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 3 months package, package came damaged, and the gummys gave me zits on the 5TH day of taking them !!! Only five days people, 98 dollars that im never seeing again, do not fall for this false advertising, the gummy is WAY to sweet there is no way something that sweet can be healthy also the texture is not the same as a gummy bear overall this is not a healthy product DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These Work wonders!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just had open heart surgery and her body went through a lot of trauma. Due to the stress her body went through she was loosing her hair. I seriously thought she was going to go bald and you could see her scalp her hair was so thin. These have helped so much and her hair is growing back and she does not loose anywhere near the amount of hair she was. Not to mention they taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Acne city
customer_reviews.text: I will say they taste really good! I had super high hopes but so far not going so well :( I’ve never struggled with acne but I noticed I’ve been breaking out a ton lately. I saw that on the reviews but thought I’d give it a shot. I’m a month in so no real change in the length of my hair. I am going to continue for another month and update my review if necessary!
customer_reviews.author: Coley

customer_reviews.title: RUINED MY SKIN
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try these, despite reading the reviews saying these vitamins ruined their skin. Well I should have listened because within a week of taking them my skin was absolutely awful!!!! I never break out and my face became COVERED in pimples. The only good thing about these are the taste. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Don't understand the hype
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tasting gummies I've tried but they did nothing for me. I didn't even breakout like I typically do whenever I start taking Biotin. Compared ingredients to the Vitafusion Women's Gummies and the SugarBearHair actually have less of almost everything. I broke out while taking Vitafusion but I find it to be a better supplement if you're trying to grow your hair.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Taste good, but no significant results
customer_reviews.text: I tried these for 7 months. They taste great and were easy to take. I was taking Folexin for two months and saw results, but didn’t want to take capsules anymore and decided to try these. There are a couple of key ingredients that through trial and error, I now know work for me: Bamboo and Horsetail. These gummies don’t have those ingredients. It has a good amount of Biotin and that may work for you. Overall, it did not produce the results that I was expecting to see. Going back to my prior vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker vitamins.♥️
customer_reviews.text: I just had to write a review. These vitamins are awesome. I recently chopped my hair due to problems with extremely bad hair loss and thinning and am currently on a journey to grow my hair back healthier and longer again. I've only been taking these for 2 weeks and have had significant growth since then. Sugar bear was a God send for me. Miracle worker. I have a before picture and will post it and an after picture after a month or two of growth to show results over a slightly longer period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbuyerette

customer_reviews.title: Same ingredients as multi-vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: I took these gummies for half a year before closely studying the ingredients. Turns out that Sugar Bear Gummies have basically every ingredient you’ll get in your normal multivitamin (I've usually taken Olly Women’s and Nature Made Multi). The exception is high levels of Biotin. Now I take my normal multivitamin and a biotin supplement, which costs $9 for a bottle of 130 instead of $40 for one bottle of Sugar Bear. I’m getting all of the same vitamins for 1/4 of the cost. I do think Sugar Bear is good, but only if you aren’t already getting the associated vitamins elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: smb321

customer_reviews.title: Solid product if your ok with the price
customer_reviews.text: Need to give your hair a boost? These are not cheap but a quality product that can get you going on your path to hair recovery. If you have the money to stay on them great but if not pick up some high quality biotin (Sports Research) and fish oil (Carlson’s) for daily use and periodically run a cycle of BioSil capsules. If you are a Bullet Proof Coffee or homemade smoothie maker consider adding a scoop of collagen (Sports Research) to the mix.
customer_reviews.author: The Sites Unofficial Pharmacist

customer_reviews.title: These vitamins caused my skin to break out horribly. I never had the pimple problem in puberty ...
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins caused my skin to break out horribly. I never had the pimple problem in puberty nor even when I stopped my birth control. With these vitamins my skins appereance has changed to worse and I had pimples coming out like crazy. I stopped them after 3 weeks and have 3 weeks without having them and still my skin hasn't gone back to normal. I read online other people have had the same problem so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaK

customer_reviews.title: Great marketing. Low results.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I've been experiencing tremendous hair loss. There was a lot of good reviews, so I took a chance. These vitamins made my hair grow faster, but sadly, that's it. It didn't make more hair grow, nor did it make it thicker. The taste of these were very berry like. Tasted like candy. But the after taste was atrocious. Definitely had to wash it down with something else. I took two every day for a month as instructed, but to no avail. If hair loss is prevalent in your family history, then these probably will not be much of a help to you.
customer_reviews.author: ShelbySayre

customer_reviews.title: I’m about three days in and my scalp feels like the hair follicles are alive
customer_reviews.text: When I started growing my hair out( 10 years ago), I read somewhere if when you’re taking a hair vitamin and your scalp starts to get a little itchy that means it’s working. Fast forward to 2018...I’m about three days in and my scalp feels like the hair follicles are alive! No joke! I can actually “feel” that my hair is getting the nourishment it needs.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!!!! 🤩
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because all of the social media hype. However, I’m glad to say these really worked. My hair was a little below shoulder length in February of this year and as of end of April it is below my mid back now. I just bought these for my mom and sister to try! Highly recommend and they are so tasty too!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Fultz

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for about 8 months now and they have helped me. I'm a Cancer survivor and it took a toll on my hair. I waited before I did a review to see if they actually helped. I will definitely continue taking them. They taste great too.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my mom and I. We noticed that our hair was falling out less, we havnt paid any attention to our nails. We stopped taking them for about 2 months and noticed our hair falling out again. In our opinion, they work because our hair isn't falling out in clumps anymore after taking them afater for about 3 months. We love these and my bathroombdrain is also happy because its not always clogged up!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Bad product source
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even try these vitamins. I ordered the bottle after reading the reviews and figured I would give it a shot. To be safe I'm going to order from the manufacturer instead because the bottle I got from Amazon was 1/3 full of warped gummies.. I don't want to risk it
customer_reviews.author: Jon & Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Addictive Taste 🤤
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I’m on my second bottle now.. Watching enough people eat them on Youtube is what reeled me in ,hopefully the results will keep me as a permanent customer. I can’t lie I’m a hair infinity ♾ girl 👧 all the way, but I wanted to give the Sugar Bear 🐻 brand a try. So my daily routine is to take two of the sugar bear gummies ,along side with one hair infinity ♾ pill 💊 at the same time. I have noticed extra hair growth since using it ,the bonus is the Hair gummy bears 🐻 taste 😋 yummy 🤤. I would highly recommend these hair vitamins !!
customer_reviews.author: Gyteya

customer_reviews.title: One month, it may be beginning to work:)
customer_reviews.text: Recently my hair started falling out rapidly. Not sure what the cause was, menopause, bad shampoo, stress?I started taking Sugar Bear about a month ago along with other biotin, multivitamins, etc. I believe my hair is starting to fall out less. That’s a win for me. I will follow up with another review in a couple months. Needless to say I ordered my second bottle. Note it has 60 bears but you need to take 2 per day, hence a 30 day supply.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Mom, she’s been using them for over a year now and WOW can you tell the difference. I was super skeptical about this product but it actually does make hair thicker and healthier looking.
customer_reviews.author: Nat Nat

customer_reviews.title: Sceptic turned believer
customer_reviews.text: A coworker of mine told me about these a few weeks ago so I thought I would give then a try. I've always had fine hair and wanted to find something to help the overall health of my hair. Well the taste of these were what won me over first. They taste amazing. It's like a small treat! Then I'm starting to notice a change in my hair. I cant say how amazing yet since it's still so new but I'm very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholscl

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 2 months after getting my hair cut way too short. My hair has gotten somewhat thicker and shinier. My hair hasn’t grown significantly on these. They did break my face out. I think any other biotin works just as well. These are endorsed by celebrities and I just don’t think they are worth they hype, $30, & facial breakouts
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend: -) Update After taking them for 2 month ...
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed that my eyelashes grew back!! I lostmost of my eyelashes do to wearing eyelash extentions for long period of time. I have also noticed my hair has grown and it's a lot shinier and soft! Its only been 1 month for me and I'm ordering a second bottle! Highly recommend :-) Update After taking them for 2 month I started breaking out bad even when I drank plenty of water. I stopped taking them and my skin cleared up and decided to go with a more affordable biotin gummy for only $10.00 (5,000 mg) and no break out what so ever and have had great results in hair & nail growth
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: It works BUT...
customer_reviews.text: My hair is thick and grows very slowly. I had an awful hair cut and bought these immediately bc I wanted longer hair for my wedding. I’ve been taking them for two months straight and I can tell a difference that my hair is growing much faster, however the reviews about getting acne is real. Luckily I work from home and can deal with it but I’m getting acne on my face like a teenager again which sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M Buckle

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: These work extremely well!! My haircuts barely last 3-4 days before it’s time for a touch up. I did notice I had excess pimples like a lot of others noted as well. This was taken care of simply by drinking water. I don’t mean solely drinking water, I mean consistently hydrating. These gummies contain more than the recommended amount of biotin per dosage. You can’t expect your body to not react to you intaking a large quantities of a supplement and it not being flushed out. Drink plenty of water and you’ll be. Also, try taking these with your last meal of the night for better results!
customer_reviews.author: SAVXD

customer_reviews.title: They actually work!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this product. I was very skeptical at first. But after about two weeks of taking the supplements I noticed my hair and nails were getting longer. After 1 month of of using the vitamins, my mom and sister noticed my hair and nail growth. I think I will be on these supplements forever. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: After a month, my hairstylist and family could tell my hair was becoming thicker and growing more. I turned to sugarhairbear to help my hair after I started thinning (hormones after pregnancy). I did experience acne the first few weeks like I had read about in many reviews on here, but I drink water daily at work so it went away; but it does give you a nice glow after it’s really started working it’s magic on you.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these despite the reviews about it giving people acne. I wanted to try them for myself. I will admit that when I first bought them I saw a pimple or two. But they went away and I haven’t had much issue with acne since. I have been taking them for about 2 months and I ordered another month supply. I see a difference in my hair and so does my hair stylist.
customer_reviews.author: RS Teacher

customer_reviews.title: My hair was in the worst shape. I had been trying any and everything ...
customer_reviews.text: My hair was in the worst shape. I had been trying any and everything from special shampoos and hair products (Monat, etc.) to using no heat at all on my hair. This was ongoing for 2 years. I have seen more improvement in the condition of my hair in 20 DAYS, since starting SugarBear Hair, than I have in the past 2 years. I am a believer. Will definitely be purchasing every month.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: One bottle gone, ordering another...
customer_reviews.text: I just finished my first bottle of SugarBear Hair and so far I am happy with the results. I am actually ordering my 2nd bottle now. I can tell that my really thin nails are stronger and my hair feels and looks healthier and thicker. I just recently had a few inches cut off so that my be making my hair look thicker but I’m willing to get a 2nd bottle after seeing the difference in my nails. I did not have any issues with breaking out but I rarely get breakouts either. The vitamins taste good so taking them every day is easy especially since I leave them next to my bathroom sink:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT.....TRY IT
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Taste great I have tried many different vitamins to help imrpove my hair in length and vume; from prenatal to hair-skin-nails vitamins in all brands, wasting hundreds of dollars. Non have worked. This was recommended by my sister-in-law, who I had made a comment about her hair looking longer and healthier. So I thought what the heck, one more won't hurt. So I ordered a bottle. I noticed a difference in my hair the first week and have gotten compliments about how thick and long my hair looks. I take 1 pill per day and 2 pills every other day....this way it lasts longer. Con: Little pricey for amazon
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Breakouts beware
customer_reviews.text: Made me break out, wish i could get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Alison Boucher

product_meta.title: SugarBearHair Vitamins, Vegetarian Gummy Hair Vitamins with Biotin, Vitamin D, Vitamin B-12, Folic Acid, Vitamin A (1 Month Supply)
feature_bullets: We designed our vitamins for those who were looking for easy to eat vitamins without the struggle of swallowing pills. Improve overall health & increase hair strength
This vegetarian formula is based off of clinical trials that have shown these ingredients to improve hair growth
Nourish your hair from within with our cruelty free gummy bear hair vitamins
Vitamin A, Vitamin C, Vitamin D, Vitamin E, Vitamin B-6, Folic Acid, Vitamin B-12, Biotin, Pantothenic Acid, Iodine, Zinc, Choline, Inositol, as the active vitamins and minerals
